elements.text: Joining a recreational sports team gets you excited about exercising. Your symptoms cause you to miss the ball during a game, and the other team scores. You are nervous your team will be upset with you, but you remember that your teammates are just there to have...

elements.name: Sports League_Early/Mid-Stage Symptoms_puzzle1
elements.incorrect_feedback: Whoops! That doesn't look right. Please wait a moment and try again.
